name: edit_after_file_modified
description: File was modified between formatting and editing — line 2 changed, hashline detects hash mismatch and fails safely
hashline_fail_reason: Hash 65 was computed for original 'let db = connect(config);' but file now has 'let db = connect(config.clone());' with hash 7e
